name: Parrot AR Drone and Gyro Flyer Video

description: If this video conversion is interrupted, either by the user exiting the flight app prior to recording being finished, the drone's battery going flat, or if the drone crash lands, the videos will not have been converted and stay in the original format state.
The manufacturer's tip in such a scenario is to not touch or rename these temporary files, but simply power on the AR.Drone 2., plug in the USB stick and video files will be processed anew shortly.
